Summary: square looking w/ 2 sets of white lights on each side and a red blinking light in the middle
trends: There have been no other sightings in Clintwood
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi heard the sound of a jet engine while sitting in my living room. there's alot of military refuel flights pass over in the evening so i was hope to catch a look at one, cause it sounded really low, lower than usual. so i walked out onto my porch and seen the plane, object, what ever. it sounded like a jet, but it didn't look like any kind of aircraft i had ever seen. it was big, but the lights were really strange. no lights on the wings or tail just eight lights, two on each corner and a red strobe type light in the middle. does anyone know if this could be some experemental jet?
